jd: From: GUNJAN, PINAKA STAFFING gunjan@pinakastaffing.com Reply to: gunjan@pinakastaffing.com Position: IFS/ .NET DeveloperLocation: Remote with TravelType: Contract (40 hours a week / CST)Duration: 12+ MonthsTravel Frequency: 1-2 weeks onsite per quarter (Expenses will be covered by the client) We don't need .NET DeveloperWe need IFS ERP Developer / with API, .NET & C# Experience Here is the Job description for your reference: Our client is migrating from JDE World (iSeries) to IFS ERP and is looking for a technical consultant to join the team. They need someone with strong IFS and Web Services experience to integrate their ERP with web applications. They want to use SOAP/REST API’s to interface with .NET/C# programs.Required Skills:• 5+ years of IFS ERP experience in a manufacturing environment• 10+ years of .NET, C# development• 5+ years of Web Services, SOAP/REST APIs• 5+ years of PL/SQL• 2+ years of Javascript; Angular and/or Bootstrap• Strong experience writing customizations and integrations• Ability to work 8-5, M-F on a CST schedule• Ability to travel onsite as needed for “Requirement Gathering” sessions
